agh.edu.pl.MapNotes.controller

Class MapController

  • java.lang.Object
    • agh.edu.pl.MapNotes.controller.MapController

  • @RestController
 @RequestMapping(value="/map")
public class MapController
extends java.lang.Object
    Controller to manage maps.
    See Also:
    Map, PinController

    • Method Summary

    • Method Detail

      • getAllMaps

        @GetMapping
public java.util.List<Map> getAllMaps()
        Get all maps in the database.
        Returns:
        list of all maps in the database.

      • putMap

        @PutMapping
public Map putMap(@Valid @RequestBody
                               @Valid Map map)
        Update or create map. Function allow to create map or to update. If the id match id of any map it will update that map. Otherwise it will create new map with new id. Function allow to add multiple pins, but don't allow to delete them. Update only fields that are passed in request body.
        Parameters:
        map - map to update or create.
        Returns:
        map stored in database after operation.

      • getMapById

        @GetMapping(value="/{mapId}")
public Map getMapById(@PathVariable(value="mapId")
                                                     java.lang.Long mapId)
                                              throws MapNotFoundException
        Get information about specified map.
        Parameters:
        mapId - id of map to get.
        Returns:
        founded map.
        Throws:
        MapNotFoundException - when map was not found in database.

      • addPin

        @PutMapping(value="/{mapId}/pin")
public Pin addPin(@PathVariable(value="mapId")
                                                     java.lang.Long mapId,
                                                     @Valid @RequestBody
                                                     @Valid Pin pin)
                                              throws MapNotFoundException
        Function allow to add or update one pin on specified map. If the pinId match id of any pin it will update that pin. Otherwise it will create new pin with new id.
        Parameters:
        mapId - id of map to manipulate on.
        pin - pin to add or update.
        Returns:
        pin stored in database after operation.
        Throws:
        MapNotFoundException - when map was not found in database.

      • deleteMapById

        @DeleteMapping(value="/{mapId}")
public void deleteMapById(@PathVariable(value="mapId")
                                                            java.lang.Long mapId)
        Delete map from database. All pins that are connected to this map will be deleted as well.
        Parameters:
        mapId - id of map to delete.
